transference.subtitle: Calculate tLi‚Å∫ using the **Bruce-Vincent (Evans) method**.
transference.iss_help: Current at steady state from chronoamperometry
transference.method_desc:
**Bruce-Vincent Method** (also called Evans method):

1. Perform EIS to measure initial interfacial resistance R‚ÇÄ
2. Apply small DC polarization ŒîV (10-20 mV)
3. Record chronoamperometry: I‚ÇÄ at t=0, I‚Çõ‚Çõ at steady state
4. Perform EIS again to measure final interfacial resistance R‚Çõ‚Çõ
5. Calculate tLi‚Å∫ using the formula above
transference.expected_values:
**Expected values:**
- PEO-based SPE: 0.2-0.4
- Gel polymer electrolytes: 0.3-0.6
- Single-ion conductors: >0.9
transference.common_issues:
**Common issues:**
- tLi‚Å∫ < 0: Wrong resistance assignment or sign error
- tLi‚Å∫ > 1: Not at steady state, or parasitic reactions
